name: GSI Glacier Stainless Steel 9 Cup Percolator
description: Now updated with an ergonomic, heat-resistant silicone handle and BPA-free resin knob, this durable stainless-steel 9-cup coffee percolator might be your new best camping buddy.Resin PercView top.18-8 stainless steel and seamless construction.Hinged lid won't get lost.Silicone handle stays cool to the touch.Precision-fitted, 3-part percolator system.
